se.miun.dt142g.food

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.miun.dt142g.DataSource
      • se.miun.dt142g.food.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Ingredient>

    public class Inventory
extends DataSource
implements java.lang.Iterable<Ingredient>
    This class is a container class for se.miun.dt142g.data.Ingredient An instance of the class stores Ingredients in an ArrayList and uses superclass DataSource methods for server interaction.
    See Also:
    Iterable, Datasource

    • Method Detail

      • getIngredient

        public Ingredient getIngredient(int id)
        Searches list of ingredients for an Ingredient with the given id and if it's found returns that Ingredient
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Ingredient object to get.
        Returns:
        returns Ingredient object if an Ingredient with correct id is in the list of ingredients, else returns null

      • getIngredients

      • addJsonIngredient

        public boolean addJsonIngredient(org.json.JSONObject jsonIngredient)
        Adds Ingredient from json object to list of ingredients
        Parameters:
        jsonIngredient - json object representing an Ingredient to add
        Returns:
        returns true if the ingredient was successfully added
